definitions.definition: The way in which symbols are mapped onto bytes , e.g. in the rendering of a particular font , or in the mapping from keyboard input into visual text.
A conversion of plain text into a code or cypher form (for transmission to a recipient).

main_definition: ( computing ) The way in which symbols are mapped onto bytes , e.g. in the rendering of a particular font , or in the mapping from keyboard input into visual text.
secondary_definitions: A conversion of plain text into a code or cypher form (for transmission to a recipient).
